  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/claireperrymp" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">Claire Perry</a><span class="ProfileHeaderCard-badges"><a href="/help/verified" class="js-tooltip" target="_blank" title="Verified account" data-placement="right" rel="noopener"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></a></span>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/claireperrymp">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">claireperrymp</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">Working hard for the people of the Devizes Constituency. Minister of State for Energy and Clean Growth.</p>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-location ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--geo Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Claire Perry Retweeted Conservatives</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Conservative MP and Macmillan cancer nurse <a href="/mariacaulfield" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="207697553"><s>@</s><b>mariacaulfield</b></a> stops Labour lies in their tracks.<a href="https://t.co/c4gfHVXqVO" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/conservatives/status/974312504070373379" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/conservatives/status/974312504070373379"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/conservatives/</span><span class="invisible">status/974312504070373379</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Claire Perry added,</p>

Tue 3-Wed 11 April 7am-7pm
Road closed to traffic. Efforts will be made to maintain access for residents, businesses &amp; shoppers. If access to the car park is not possible from George Lane manned 2-way access will be via the High Street

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="973547993126359040" id="stream-item-tweet-973547993126359040" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;973547993126359040&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="973217292082405376" id="stream-item-tweet-973217292082405376" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;973217292082405376&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Dept for BEIS Retweeted Catherine McKenna</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">.<a href="/claireperrymp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="939151060391940096"><s>@</s><b>claireperrymp</b></a>: Im delighted that Ireland has committed to phasing out unabated coal power generation by 2025, joining the <a href="/hashtag/PoweringPastCoal?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>PoweringPastCoal</b></a> alliance which now has 59 members. <a href="/hashtag/CleanGrowth?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>CleanGrowth</b></a><a href="https://t.co/sDnO8C47tn" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/cathmckenna/status/972546641851858944" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/cathmckenna/status/972546641851858944"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/cathmckenna/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/972546641851858944</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Dept for BEIS added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/cathmckenna/status/972546641851858944" data-conversation-id="972546641851858944" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="972546641851858944" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="cathmckenna" data-user-id="140252240" href="/cathmckenna/status/972546641851858944" data-conversation-id="972546641851858944" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">

  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">

  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Proud to announce that today we welcome a new member to the <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>PoweringPastCoal</b></span> initiative: Ireland! Proud to be working with you, <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="21811630"><s>@</s><b>DenisNaughten</b></span> to grow a clean economy, take action on climate change and build a</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I'm so proud on <span class="twitter-hashflag-container"><a href="/hashtag/IWD2018?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>IWD2018</b></a><a href="/hashtag/IWD2018?src=hash" dir="ltr"><img class="twitter-hashflag" src="https://abs.twimg.com/hashflags/womenshistorymonth2018_v3/womenshistorymonth2018_v3.png" draggable="false" alt="" /></a></span> to launch the consultation for our landmark Domestic Abuse Bill. This is an opportunity to transform the way we think about domestic abuse, understanding that it comes in many forms, supporting victims &amp; creating a society that has zero tolerance of abuse<a href="https://t.co/8F0hVjxain" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/8F0hVjxain</a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">On International Women's Day, we're celebrating the contribution of women to the energy sector and wider society. 

Yesterday <a href="/Jenifer_Baxter" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2892168112"><s>@</s><b>Jenifer_Baxter</b></a> attended a <a href="/Policy_Exchange" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="171000782"><s>@</s><b>Policy_Exchange</b></a> event to discuss the hydrogen economy with <a href="/claireperrymp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="939151060391940096"><s>@</s><b>claireperrymp</b></a> and colleagues from <a href="/imperialcollege" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="15353955"><s>@</s><b>imperialcollege</b></a> and <a href="/beisgovuk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="45205091"><s>@</s><b>beisgovuk</b></a><a href="https://t.co/4bxtNvnccz" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/4bxtNvnccz</a></p>
</div>

  <div class="dismissed-module">
    <div class="feedback-actions">
        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

Mitchell Reason (Rowde) has joined my team and is working with Wiltshire College to complete a Business Admin apprenticeship.12,000 local young people have started an Apprenticeship since 2011 and I would encourage all young people to start their career with an apprenticeship</p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Happy National Apprenticeship Week

I have been delighted to employ two local young apprentices over the last few years.  Georgia Mundy a former student at <a href="/StJohnsMarlb" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1244638082"><s>@</s><b>StJohnsMarlb</b></a> has completed her Business Administration Apprenticeship and now works in my Westminster office. <a href="/hashtag/NAW2018?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>NAW2018</b></a> 
1/2<a href="https://t.co/TUsod8pG0E" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/TUsod8pG0E</a></p>
</div>

    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        is-square&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        &#10;        ">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">A fantastic event showcasing our member's innovative technologies to <a href="/claireperrymp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="939151060391940096"><s>@</s><b>claireperrymp</b></a> <a href="/alanwhiteheadmp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="389443487"><s>@</s><b>alanwhiteheadmp</b></a>, and other parliamentarians. Thanks to all who attended and thank you to our speakers <a href="/hashtag/energyinnovation2018?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>energyinnovation2018</b></a>. The photos from the event can be found here: <a href="https://t.co/IoWAv3uw5E" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://goo.gl/iCJ7ak" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://goo.gl/iCJ7ak"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">goo.gl/iCJ7ak</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/yHq7qLhsc3" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/yHq7qLhsc3</a></p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="971035732004495361" data-item-id="971035732004495361" data-permalink-path="/beisgovuk/status/971035732004495361" data-conversation-id="971035732004495361" data-tweet-nonce="971035732004495361-920bf196-a341-4972-859f-f92eb238c81a" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="971035818910502912" data-retweeter="claireperrymp" data-screen-name="beisgovuk" data-name="Dept for BEIS" data-user-id="45205091" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="GregClarkMP claireperrymp" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;45205091&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;beisgovuk&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Dept for BEIS&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Dept for BEIS&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Dept for BEIS&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;939151060391940096&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;claireperrymp&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Claire Perry&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Claire Perry&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Claire Perry&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;224655400&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;GregClarkMP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Greg Clark&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Greg Clark&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Greg Clark&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Ministers <a href="/GregClarkMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="224655400"><s>@</s><b>GregClarkMP</b></a> &amp; <a href="/claireperrymp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="939151060391940096"><s>@</s><b>claireperrymp</b></a> want to see the energy price cap introduced for next winter. It is encouraging to see <a href="/ofgem" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="28830376"><s>@</s><b>ofgem</b></a> commit today to making sure it is protecting people with their bills by the end of the year.<a href="https://t.co/fmgemvR6lf" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://socsi.in/LHj7R" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://socsi.in/LHj7R"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">socsi.in/LHj7R</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

  </div>
</div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Great news! The A346 is now open ready for the working week ahead.<a href="https://t.co/qKSvIB4oiM" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/WiltshireWinter/status/970336110223200257" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/WiltshireWinter/status/970336110223200257"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/WiltshireWinte</span><span class="invisible">r/status/970336110223200257</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Wiltshire Police added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/WiltshireWinter/status/970336110223200257" data-conversation-id="970336110223200257" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>

      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">

  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Nice to now see the A346 Chiseldon open and traffic once again using it now the abandoned vehicle have all beed cleared. <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>teamwork</b></span> <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="66327431"><s>@</s><b>wiltshirepolice</b></span></div>

            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">*SNOW ADVICE* the weather is causing disruptions across the county. We are advising people to stay home &amp; stay warm where possible. All updates on road closures will be available on our website here: <a href="https://t.co/6fRgU4LRIo" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.wiltshire.police.uk/article/649/Road-closures" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.wiltshire.police.uk/article/649/Road-closures"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">wiltshire.police.uk/article/649/Ro</span><span class="invisible">ad-closures</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/kJLuYLU9xB" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/kJLuYLU9xB</a></p>
</div>


      

      
            <div class="AdaptiveMediaOuterContainer">
    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        is-square&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        &#10;        ">
      <div class="AdaptiveMedia-container">
          <div class="AdaptiveMedia-singlePhoto" style="padding-top: calc(1.0 * 100% - 0.5px);">
    <div class="AdaptiveMedia-photoContainer js-adaptive-photo " data-image-url="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DXRl_GlXUAARwvc.jpg" data-element-context="platform_photo_card" style="background-color:rgba(24,37,51,1.0);" data-dominant-color="[24,37,51]">
  <img data-aria-label-part="" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DXRl_GlXUAARwvc.jpg" alt="Only leave your home if absolutely necessary. If heading out, allow plenty of time, take necessary supplies &amp; always let someone know where you are going &amp; how long you expect to be. Call in on elderly or vulnerable neighbours to make sure they're ok. If your vehicle gets stuck in the snow you must remain calm &amp; try to pull over safely. Stay warm &amp; call us. If you need urgent assistance call us on 999." style="width: 100%; top: -0px;" />
</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">You may have seen on my FB -  My Devizes Office is closed today however, please do still email claire.perry.mp@parliament if you need assistance. Thank you to all the doctors, nurses, care workers, police and other essential workers who are working across the area today. <a href="/hashtag/snowday?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>snowday</b></a></p>

        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Theresa May</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>theresa_may</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">In the current bad weather, I want to say thank you to everyone going the extra mile to keep our country moving - and to keep us safe. Thank you to NHS staff and care workers, the police and the armed forces, and all</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Energy Minister <a href="/claireperrymp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="939151060391940096"><s>@</s><b>claireperrymp</b></a>: The <a href="/nationalgriduk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="109525104"><s>@</s><b>nationalgriduk</b></a> is following a standard procedure &amp; peoples domestic gas supplies wont be affected. So do carry on using your gas heating &amp; cooking meals as normal. I am in constant contact with National Grid."</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">On the final day of LGBT+ history month it's important to remember that LGBT+ history is all our history. LGBT+ success is everyone's success. And LGBT+ rights are human rights. <a href="/hashtag/LGBTHM18?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>LGBTHM18</b></a><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f3f3-fe0f-200d-1f308.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Rainbow flag" aria-label="Emoji: Rainbow flag" /><a href="https://t.co/CN54SQIwOL" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/CN54SQIwOL</a></p>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">5</span>
  </span>

  </button>

  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">My column in this week's <a href="/wiltsgazette" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="117384995"><s>@</s><b>wiltsgazette</b></a><a href="https://t.co/erCntzVKvg" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.claireperry.org.uk/news/gazette-herald-column-every-child-should-get-education-suits-them" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.claireperry.org.uk/news/gazette-herald-column-every-child-should-get-education-suits-them"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">claireperry.org.uk/news/gazette-h</span><span class="invisible">erald-column-every-child-should-get-education-suits-them</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Renewables produced enough energy in 2017 to power Britain for the whole of 1958. <a href="https://t.co/rTNVtlW3dA" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://socsi.in/VyXhx" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://socsi.in/VyXhx"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">socsi.in/VyXhx</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> <a href="/hashtag/CleanGrowth?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>CleanGrowth</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/IndustrialStrategy?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>IndustrialStrategy</b></a><a href="https://t.co/9DySjb2J39" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/9DySjb2J39</a></p>

  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
        <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedVideo" data-nav="embed_video">
          <button type="button" class="dropdown-link"> Embed Video</button>
        </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Left unchecked, <a href="/hashtag/ClimateChange?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ClimateChange</b></a> would ravage our natural environment and, along with it, our health and prosperity.  <a href="/claireperrymp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="939151060391940096"><s>@</s><b>claireperrymp</b></a> writes about Kyoto 13 years on <a href="/timesredbox" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2709717300"><s>@</s><b>timesredbox</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/CleanGrowth?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>CleanGrowth</b></a>  <a href="https://t.co/I8gomKjNWM" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://socsi.in/5NXir" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://socsi.in/5NXir"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">socsi.in/5NXir</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/VnGv40EbHC" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/VnGv40EbHC</a></p>

        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">13 years since the Kyoto protocol, the UK is still leading the charge to a low carbon future, writes <a href="/claireperrymp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="939151060391940096"><s>@</s><b>claireperrymp</b></a> for today's Red Box <a href="https://t.co/IMuqNKovhB" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://bit.ly/2ERZ8tO" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://bit.ly/2ERZ8tO"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">bit.ly/2ERZ8tO</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/Q4HYXX8lfe" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Q4HYXX8lfe</a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Patients should come first, not legal firms. That's why we're introducing a cap on legal fees paid to lawyers in clinical negligence cases, saving up to 45 million a year.<a href="https://t.co/wyA8T99lFT" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/wyA8T99lFT</a></p>
</div>


      

      
            <div class="AdaptiveMediaOuterContainer">
    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        is-square&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        &#10;        ">
      <div class="AdaptiveMedia-container">
          <div class="AdaptiveMedia-singlePhoto" style="padding-top: calc(0.5625 * 100% - 0.5px);">
    <div class="AdaptiveMedia-photoContainer js-adaptive-photo " data-image-url="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DWFq1VHWAAIxFbZ.jpg" data-element-context="platform_photo_card" style="background-color:rgba(18,51,64,1.0);" data-dominant-color="[18,51,64]">
  <img data-aria-label-part="" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DWFq1VHWAAIxFbZ.jpg" alt="We're protecting the NHS by capping the amount lawyers can claim, saving our vital service 45 million a year." style="width: 100%; top: -0px;" />
</div>


</div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Devizes MP <a href="/claireperrymp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="939151060391940096"><s>@</s><b>claireperrymp</b></a> is urging local farmers to apply for funding for new farm equipment via a 60million grants scheme. Farmers can apply online to the Countryside Productivity Small Grant Scheme, requesting a grant between 3k &amp; 12k. <a href="https://t.co/OCcsnnKzD8" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.gov.uk/guidance/countryside-productivity-scheme" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.gov.uk/guidance/countryside-productivity-scheme"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">gov.uk/guidance/count</span><span class="invisible">ryside-productivity-scheme</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> <a href="/yourwiltshire" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="89560937"><s>@</s><b>yourwiltshire</b></a><a href="https://t.co/y6awDy8frN" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/y6awDy8frN</a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">MP <a href="/claireperrymp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="939151060391940096"><s>@</s><b>claireperrymp</b></a> has welcomed the latest UCAS data which shows that university application rates for 18-year-olds from Devizes &amp; across the country continue to rise. In Devizes, 33% of 18-year-olds applied for uni by January 2018, compared with 24% in 2009. <a href="/yourwiltshire" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="89560937"><s>@</s><b>yourwiltshire</b></a><a href="https://t.co/DY8z7MTGg2" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/DY8z7MTGg2</a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">A reminder that <a href="/wiltscouncil" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="252984042"><s>@</s><b>wiltscouncil</b></a> will be closing London Road by the Bell on the Green in Devizes for upgrades to the Pelican crossing between 1800-0000 tonight. Diversion routes are in place via Windsor Drive/Nursteed Road, please do not use Church Street as a shortcut.</p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Stopping terrorist propaganda - like that of Daesh - before it ever reaches the internet.

With new technology developed by the <a href="/ukhomeoffice" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="138037459"><s>@</s><b>ukhomeoffice</b></a> and <a href="/ASIDataScience" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2325734423"><s>@</s><b>ASIDataScience</b></a> that can detect 94% of Daesh content with 99.995% accuracy, this is now a reality.<a href="https://t.co/ydXF0bjgWC" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/ydXF0bjgWC</a></p>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I popped into <a href="/TheSwanEnford" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2592923929"><s>@</s><b>TheSwanEnford</b></a> on Friday night to present them with their Best Local Pub Award for 'Best for Communities'. It was great to chat with Pete and Emma about the pub and enjoy a drink.

Congratulations again on winning!<a href="https://t.co/9AcsLK7ztq" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/9AcsLK7ztq</a></p>

  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Yesterday I signed my support for Sky Ocean Rescues <a href="/hashtag/passonplastic?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>passonplastic</b></a> campaign. We need to act now to reduce single-use plastic consumption.<a href="https://t.co/wE5Q5qAtM9" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/wE5Q5qAtM9</a></p>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="961159867267502081" id="stream-item-tweet-961159867267502081" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;961159867267502081&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">
    


  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="961159867267502081" data-item-id="961159867267502081" data-permalink-path="/beisgovuk/status/961159867267502081" data-conversation-id="961159867267502081" data-tweet-nonce="961159867267502081-c8a1b095-0793-4611-b5e5-fc6371ee0594" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="961162902903410688" data-retweeter="claireperrymp" data-screen-name="beisgovuk" data-name="Dept for BEIS" data-user-id="45205091" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="claireperrymp GregClarkMP ofgem" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;45205091&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;beisgovuk&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Dept for BEIS&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Dept for BEIS&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Dept for BEIS&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;939151060391940096&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;claireperrymp&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Claire Perry&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Claire Perry&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Claire Perry&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;224655400&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;GregClarkMP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Greg Clark&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Greg Clark&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Greg Clark&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;28830376&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;ofgem&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;ofgem&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;ofgem&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;ofgem&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">.<a href="/claireperrymp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="939151060391940096"><s>@</s><b>claireperrymp</b></a> <a href="/GregClarkMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="224655400"><s>@</s><b>GregClarkMP</b></a>: Welcome news that 1 million more vulnerable consumers will be protected by <a href="/ofgem" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="28830376"><s>@</s><b>ofgem</b></a> energy price cap <a href="https://t.co/ayAgSpI5ni" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/ministers-welcome-protection-of-1-million-more-from-high-energy-prices" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/ministers-welcome-protection-of-1-million-more-from-high-energy-prices"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">gov.uk/government/new</span><span class="invisible">s/ministers-welcome-protection-of-1-million-more-from-high-energy-prices</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/4BV6AVSzl2" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/ofgem/status/961133724363616256" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/ofgem/status/961133724363616256"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/ofgem/status/9</span><span class="invisible">61133724363616256</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Dept for BEIS added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/ofgem/status/961133724363616256" data-conversation-id="961133724363616256" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="961133724363616256" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="ofgem" data-user-id="28830376" href="/ofgem/status/961133724363616256" data-conversation-id="961133724363616256" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">ofgem</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>ofgem</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">From this month, we're protecting an additional 1 million vulnerable consumers from paying too much for their energy through the safeguard tariff.     <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">3</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">(1/2) Today, on the 100th anniversary of the first step to female suffrage, I:
- Opened the London Stock Exchange 
- Hoisted the Suffrage Flag over my Ministerial Department 
- Attended Cabinet chaired by the 2nd female PM <a href="/theresa_may" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="747807250819981312"><s>@</s><b>theresa_may</b></a><a href="https://t.co/ekginfUNBp" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/ekginfUNBp</a></p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="960846364799328256" data-item-id="960846364799328256" data-permalink-path="/beisgovuk/status/960846364799328256" data-conversation-id="960846364799328256" data-tweet-nonce="960846364799328256-8e846cd0-c0e3-46e4-a2fa-b10914fa70a3" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="960846490322264064" data-retweeter="claireperrymp" data-screen-name="beisgovuk" data-name="Dept for BEIS" data-user-id="45205091" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="claireperrymp GregClarkMP" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;45205091&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;beisgovuk&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Dept for BEIS&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Dept for BEIS&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Dept for BEIS&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;939151060391940096&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;claireperrymp&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Claire Perry&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Claire Perry&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Claire Perry&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;224655400&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;GregClarkMP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Greg Clark&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Greg Clark&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Greg Clark&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">5 years ago Patchwork organised an unique event in <a href="/UKParliament" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="6467332"><s>@</s><b>UKParliament</b></a> with leading women politicians including <a href="/claireperrymp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="939151060391940096"><s>@</s><b>claireperrymp</b></a> <a href="/CarolineLucas" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="80802900"><s>@</s><b>CarolineLucas</b></a> <a href="/angelaeagle" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="124270074"><s>@</s><b>angelaeagle</b></a> <a href="/joswinson" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14933304"><s>@</s><b>JoSwinson</b></a> &amp; leading <a href="/UKCivilService" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="80606026"><s>@</s><b>UKCivilService</b></a> from <a href="/mhclg" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="15340496"><s>@</s><b>mhclg</b></a> to 'bridge the gap.' <a href="/hashtag/100years?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>100years</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/vote100?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>vote100</b></a> Watch video here:<a href="https://t.co/vR0VSdYYyB" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://youtu.be/0T8td3FxV7k" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://youtu.be/0T8td3FxV7k"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">youtu.be/0T8td3FxV7k</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">

  </button>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">(1/2) Appalled that <a href="/SunPoliticsWest" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2221237002"><s>@</s><b>SunPoliticsWest</b></a> would falsely report my private comments as applying to anyone who voted Brexit. As is clear in my leaked messages and in all my comments, I was describing only those extremist people who referred to loyal hardworking colleagues as traitors.</p>
</div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="958697928645840896" id="stream-item-tweet-958697928645840896" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;958697928645840896&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <div class="dismissed-module">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Energy &amp; Clean Growth Minister <a href="/claireperrymp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="939151060391940096"><s>@</s><b>claireperrymp</b></a> chaired the first meeting of the Council on Carbon Capture Utilization and Storage (CCUS). The council will offer specialist advice to government, review progress of our new approach to CCUS and commitments made for <a href="/hashtag/CleanGrowth?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>CleanGrowth</b></a><a href="https://t.co/RfU9Lu7dAB" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/RfU9Lu7dAB</a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">(2/3) My comments were exclusively directed at those using the term of traitor to describe my colleagues, and to suggest that I am somehow applying them to anyone else is 100% wrong.</p>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">(1/3) The conversation with my MP colleagues was had at a time when we were all working so hard to get the Brexit Bill passed last year. Passions were running high and mine spilled over. No excuses but it was painful to see hard working, loyal colleagues branded as traitors.</p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Claire Perry Retweeted Conservatives</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Its <a href="/hashtag/HolocaustMemorialDay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>HolocaustMemorialDay</b></a> Im reading Village of Secrets by Caroline Moorehead which shows that good could be found among the evil but sadly in all too small amounts.<a href="https://t.co/9zjFutzSSH" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/conservatives/status/957197809794592768" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/conservatives/status/957197809794592768"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/conservatives/</span><span class="invisible">status/957197809794592768</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Claire Perry added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/Conservatives/status/957197809794592768" data-conversation-id="957197809794592768" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>

      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-singlePhoto">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">On <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>HolocaustMemorialDay</b></span> we remember the millions of lives lost and those who survived. We pledge to <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>NeverForget</b></span> <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/tBgT4HiA2j</span></div>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ">
        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>

  </button>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">6</span>
  </span>

  </button>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

  </div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Absolutely shocking reports of disgraceful behaviour from <a href="/hashtag/PresidentsClub?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>PresidentsClub</b></a>. Glad to hear <a href="/AnneMilton" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="312758175"><s>@</s><b>AnneMilton</b></a> clear that "If there are any men who don't know where the line is, they should come and talk to me and I will tell them".<a href="https://t.co/Z04vLJyanC" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/janemerrick23/status/956146532100853761" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/janemerrick23/status/956146532100853761"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/janemerrick23/</span><span class="invisible">status/956146532100853761</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Labour talk the talk, but in reality they cant be trusted to protect our NHS. Under the Conservatives, it has been rated as the best healthcare system in the world  <a href="/hashtag/PMQs?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>PMQs</b></a><a href="https://t.co/2klArqeS1x" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/2klArqeS1x</a></p>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">8</span>
  </span>

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="954008504616054784" data-item-id="954008504616054784" data-permalink-path="/10DowningStreet/status/954008504616054784" data-conversation-id="954008504616054784" data-tweet-nonce="954008504616054784-8ccbc984-549d-444e-83dc-5c1d5b4c45a1" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="954010433593270272" data-retweeter="claireperrymp" data-screen-name="10DowningStreet" data-name="UK Prime Minister" data-user-id="14224719" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="EmmanuelMacron" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;14224719&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;10DowningStreet&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;UK Prime Minister&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;UK Prime Minister&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;UK Prime Minister&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;939151060391940096&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;claireperrymp&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Claire Perry&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Claire Perry&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Claire Perry&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;1976143068&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;EmmanuelMacron&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Emmanuel Macron&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Emmanuel Macron&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Emmanuel Macron&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Stirling House at <a href="/hashtag/Cambridge?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Cambridge</b></a> Innovation Park <a href="/hashtag/CIP?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>CIP</b></a> and <a href="/ParagonLandLtd" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1201546698"><s>@</s><b>ParagonLandLtd</b></a> were hosts to the South Cambs Business Club Event last Thursday where <a href="/claireperrymp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="939151060391940096"><s>@</s><b>claireperrymp</b></a> was guest speaker. A great night was had by all who attended. <a href="/lucyfrazermp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3823970661"><s>@</s><b>lucyfrazermp</b></a> <a href="/IncubyteCamb" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="846321747142082560"><s>@</s><b>IncubyteCamb</b></a> <a href="/lisa_stubbs" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="587706849"><s>@</s><b>lisa_stubbs</b></a><a href="https://t.co/lloqKF8Vb5" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/lloqKF8Vb5</a></p>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Conservatives Retweeted Nusrat Ghani MP</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Another Conservative MP making history <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f44f.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Clapping hands sign" aria-label="Emoji: Clapping hands sign" /><a href="https://t.co/hPn5vkxBYS" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/Nus_Ghani/status/953960149584052224" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/Nus_Ghani/status/953960149584052224"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/Nus_Ghani/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/953960149584052224</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Conservatives added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/Nus_Ghani/status/953960149584052224" data-conversation-id="953960149584052224" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="953960149584052224" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="Nus_Ghani" data-user-id="1513382018" href="/Nus_Ghani/status/953960149584052224" data-conversation-id="953960149584052224" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-singlePhoto">
    <div class="QuoteMedia-photoContainer js-quote-photo" data-image-url="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DT0leVhWkAEW1k4.jpg" data-element-context="platform_photo_card" style="background-color:rgba(55,64,49,1.0);" data-dominant-color="[55,64,49]">

      </div>

        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Nusrat Ghani MP</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>Nus_Ghani</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Made my debut as <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="46358463"><s>@</s><b>transportgovuk</b></span> Minister and made a bit of history as the first female Muslim Minister to speak from the House of Commons dispatch box. Supported by wonderful colleagues Chris Grayling, <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="237700394"><s>@</s><b>JoJohnsonUK</b></span></div>
        </div>

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount" data-tweet-stat-count="378">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">378</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-953954047219912704">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Claire Perry Retweeted Conservatives</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Last night we voted through the important <a href="/hashtag/WithdrawalBill?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>WithdrawalBill</b></a>. The Government respects the referendum result and is delivering a smooth Brexit in the national interest, while Labour continue to play politics.<a href="https://t.co/2EHymUqHlg" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/Conservatives/status/953761620211183616" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/Conservatives/status/953761620211183616"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/Conservatives/</span><span class="invisible">status/953761620211183616</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Claire Perry added,</p>

        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Conservatives</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>Conservatives</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Was your MP amongst the 243 Labour MPs who voted to try and block the EU Withdrawal Bill which is essential for a smooth Brexit?

Tell them they must put the national interest above playing politics and</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Further Q: given that Labour fired the PFI watchdog in 1997 in order to ramp up spending, does this have implications for other independent watchdogs if Labour were ever elected? Would they abolish the NAO? Or the OBR? Can they give guarantees now that they would not do so?</p>
</div>

      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">42</span>

  </button>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Heres why we are going further than EU law on animal welfare. Our draft Animal Welfare Bill will enshrine animal sentience in all areas, the EU only covers a few. Were also increasing prison sentences for animal cruelty to up to 5 years.<a href="https://t.co/2pT5oCwTHO" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/2pT5oCwTHO</a></p>

  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
        <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedVideo" data-nav="embed_video">
          <button type="button" class="dropdown-link"> Embed Video</button>
        </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>

  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Claire Perry Retweeted Conservatives</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">This appalling intimidation has no place in politics. Thats why our candidates in upcoming local elections will sign <a href="/hashtag/respectpledge?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>respectpledge</b></a> Corbyns refusal to join us and condemn this kind of language shows Labours real commitment to a kinder, gentler politics <a href="/hashtag/Peston?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Peston</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/marr?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>marr</b></a><a href="https://t.co/PGbD6TUeG1" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/conservatives/status/952487562601467905" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/conservatives/status/952487562601467905"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/conservatives/</span><span class="invisible">status/952487562601467905</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Claire Perry added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/Conservatives/status/952487562601467905" data-conversation-id="952487562601467905" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="952487562601467905" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="Conservatives" data-user-id="14281853" href="/Conservatives/status/952487562601467905" data-conversation-id="952487562601467905" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Conservatives</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>Conservatives</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">On <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Peston</b></span> <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="117777690"><s>@</s><b>jeremycorbyn</b></span> refuses to agree to a <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>respectpledge</b></span> for Labour candidates and defends John McDonnells comments on Esther McVey.</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">.<a href="/BrandonLewis" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="16884084"><s>@</s><b>BrandonLewis</b></a> on <a href="/hashtag/Marr?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Marr</b></a>: Weve got to avoid this rot that we have seen at the top of the Labour Party . . . we will argue our case robustly, but with respect.<a href="https://t.co/CvWXTPZ8NP" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/CvWXTPZ8NP</a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Claire Perry Retweeted NS Spotlight</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">The UK is a world leader in promoting clean growth and has reduced emissions on a per-person basis faster than any other G7 nation. We want to share the benefits around the world and help other countries do the same. <a href="/hashtag/25YearEnvironmentPlan?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>25YearEnvironmentPlan</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/GreenFuture?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GreenFuture</b></a><a href="https://t.co/0dWxMBrXgk" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/ns_spotlight/status/951755011771588608" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/ns_spotlight/status/951755011771588608"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/ns_spotlight/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/951755011771588608</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Claire Perry added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/NS_Spotlight/status/951755011771588608" data-conversation-id="951755011771588608" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="951755011771588608" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="NS_Spotlight" data-user-id="786560236731543552" href="/NS_Spotlight/status/951755011771588608" data-conversation-id="951755011771588608" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">NS Spotlight</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>NS_Spotlight</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Yesterday the PM launched her <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>25YearEnvironmentPlan</b></span> to improve the natural environment. Read <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="939151060391940096"><s>@</s><b>claireperrymp</b></span>'s spotlight interview on the government's plan to reduce Britain's reliance on <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>coal</b></span>. <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GreenFuture</b></span> <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.newstatesman.com/spotlight/energy/2017/12/qa-claire-perry-minister-state-climate-change-and-industry" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.newstatesman.com/spotlight/energy/2017/12/qa-claire-perry-minister-state-climate-change-and-industry"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">newstatesman.com/spotlight/ener</span><span class="invisible">gy/2017/12/qa-claire-perry-minister-state-climate-change-and-industry</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Want to know about our <a href="/hashtag/25YearEnvironmentPlan?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>25YearEnvironmentPlan</b></a>? Here's how it will eliminate all avoidable plastic waste within a quarter of a century to help make our country <a href="/hashtag/plasticfree?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>plasticfree</b></a> and leave our environment in a better state than we found it for the next generation.<a href="https://t.co/OLVHod2ZOr" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/OLVHod2ZOr</a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Local company <a href="/MobilooUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2352326420"><s>@</s><b>MobilooUK</b></a> have been at <a href="/hashtag/Westminster?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Westminster</b></a> Abbey today to assist with a school visit. Mobiloo enable disabled people to attend any event or activity, they are often excluded due to lack of adequate facilities. I am a supporter of the Changing Places campaign.<a href="https://t.co/Bmi8EDftlZ" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Bmi8EDftlZ</a></p>

It's making a real difference. We want to do the same with single use plastics. Nobody who watched <a href="/hashtag/BluePlanet2?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BluePlanet2</b></a> will doubt the need for us to do something - and we will. <a href="/hashtag/Marr?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Marr</b></a></p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="948949213576138753" data-item-id="948949213576138753" data-permalink-path="/claireperrymp/status/948949213576138753" data-conversation-id="948949213576138753" data-tweet-nonce="948949213576138753-1d12fb3c-3c46-408b-910c-2632b1773c04" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="claireperrymp" data-name="Claire Perry" data-user-id="939151060391940096" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;939151060391940096&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;claireperrymp&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Claire Perry&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Claire Perry&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Claire Perry&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/claireperrymp" data-user-id="939151060391940096">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate ">Claire Perry</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>claireperrymp</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I am glad that the Government made a multi-million pound investment in local <a href="/hashtag/NHS?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>NHS</b></a> hospitals this winter.           <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Catherine McKenna Retweeted Yale Environment 360</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">The end of King Coal in the UK is great news to bring in the new year! 

My New Year's resolution is to work with my awesome UK counterpart, @TeamBluePerry, to get more countries &amp; biz to sign on to <a href="/hashtag/PoweringPastCoal?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>PoweringPastCoal</b></a>! <a href="/hashtag/TheFutureIsClean?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>TheFutureIsClean</b></a><a href="https://t.co/OTeP6PYsLT" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/yalee360/status/947825989974937600" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/yalee360/status/947825989974937600"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/yalee360/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/947825989974937600</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Catherine McKenna added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/YaleE360/status/947825989974937600" data-conversation-id="947825989974937600" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="947825989974937600" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="YaleE360" data-user-id="19918353" href="/YaleE360/status/947825989974937600" data-conversation-id="947825989974937600" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Yale Environment 360</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>YaleE360</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">5 years ago, Britain got 40% of its electricity from coal. This summer, that figure was less than 2%. Learn more:

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount" data-tweet-stat-count="3630">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">3.6K</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

  </div>
</div>
