          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Lucy Allan MP Retweeted UK Prime Minister</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Christmas message from the Prime Minister...Happy Christmas everyone.<a href="https://t.co/Mvu123k98B" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/number10gov/status/944620051642109954" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/number10gov/status/944620051642109954"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/number10gov/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/944620051642109954</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Lucy Allan MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/10DowningStreet/status/944620051642109954" data-conversation-id="944620051642109954" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="944620051642109954" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="10DowningStreet" data-user-id="14224719" href="/10DowningStreet/status/944620051642109954" data-conversation-id="944620051642109954" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
              <div class="QuoteMedia-videoPreview">
      <img data-aria-label-part="" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DRt4JqaW0AA8d-Y.jpg" alt="" style="width: 100%; top: -0px;" />
      <div class="AdaptiveMedia-badge">
        <div class="AdaptiveMedia-badgeText">2:49</div>
        
      </div>
  </div>


      </div>
  </div>

        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">UK Prime Minister</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>10DowningStreet</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">"This year we will celebrate Christmas secure in the knowledge that our servicemen and women, many far away from their own loved ones at this special time of year, are working to keep us safe. Thank you. - Prime</div>
        </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">My Christmas message to the <a href="/labour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="6751502"><s>@</s><b>labour</b></a> Party: please stop spreading lies about universal credit: the vital reform to our welfare system that you used to support.<a href="https://t.co/iWnY5NeHql" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/DavidGauke/status/943847521029447685" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/DavidGauke/status/943847521029447685"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/DavidGauke/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/943847521029447685</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The UK passport is an expression of our independence and sovereignty  symbolising our citizenship of a proud, great nation. That's why we have announced that the iconic <a href="/hashtag/bluepassport?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>bluepassport</b></a> will return after we leave the European Union in 2019.<a href="https://t.co/pgQvrBIna5" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.conservatives.com/sharethefacts/2017/12/blue-passports" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.conservatives.com/sharethefacts/2017/12/blue-passports"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">conservatives.com/sharethefacts/</span><span class="invisible">2017/12/blue-passports</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

My Government is doing all it can to help end the <a href="/hashtag/leaseholdscandal?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>leaseholdscandal</b></a> - making it cheaper and easier to own a home.<a href="https://t.co/eaHUqGp2AW" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/eaHUqGp2AW</a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Claire Perry Retweeted Conservatives</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Delighted that the Government today announced up to 370 million of new investment in the Post Office to ensure that the post office network is fit for the future.<a href="https://t.co/BCvb6sles1" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/conservatives/status/943418886577410049" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/conservatives/status/943418886577410049"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/conservatives/</span><span class="invisible">status/943418886577410049</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Claire Perry added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/Conservatives/status/943418886577410049" data-conversation-id="943418886577410049" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="943418886577410049" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="Conservatives" data-user-id="14281853" href="/Conservatives/status/943418886577410049" data-conversation-id="943418886577410049" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-singlePhoto">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Today the Business Secretary <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="224655400"><s>@</s><b>GregClarkMP</b></span> pledged 370 million to secure the future of the Post Office network. <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/ER5pfBm35x</span></div>

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Peter Thompson</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>P_G_Thompson</b></span>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">The right honourable gentleman said he would be Prime Minister by Christmas. He was wrong - I am and the <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14281853"><s>@</s><b>Conservatives</b></span> are in government. 
<span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>PMQs</b></span>. <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/hPH14oUNHs</span></div>

      <span class="Icon Icon--small Icon--retweeted"></span>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/claireperrymp" data-user-id="939151060391940096">

Congratulations to <a href="/hashtag/StJoseph?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>StJoseph</b></a>s who achieved Good in their March 2017 <a href="/Ofstednews" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="197378511"><s>@</s><b>Ofstednews</b></a> inspection.<a href="https://t.co/jyKPnxv9Pj" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/jyKPnxv9Pj</a></p>

  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Theresa May Retweeted Neil O'Brien MP</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I'm very pleased Parliament is supporting our efforts to pass a ban on plastic microbeads which pollute our oceans. Looking after our environment is vitally important.<a href="https://t.co/ojoe6MUPZj" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/neildotobrien/status/942810043161948161" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/neildotobrien/status/942810043161948161"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/neildotobrien/</span><span class="invisible">status/942810043161948161</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Theresa May added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/NeilDotObrien/status/942810043161948161" data-conversation-id="942810043161948161" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="942810043161948161" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="NeilDotObrien" data-user-id="64679759" href="/NeilDotObrien/status/942810043161948161" data-conversation-id="942810043161948161" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-singlePhoto">
    <div class="QuoteMedia-photoContainer js-quote-photo" data-image-url="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DRWIr3vX0AApq51.jpg" data-element-context="platform_photo_card" style="background-color:rgba(64,60,56,1.0);" data-dominant-color="[64,60,56]">
  <img data-aria-label-part="" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DRWIr3vX0AApq51.jpg" alt="" style="width: 100%; top: -17px;" />
</div>

</div>


      </div>
  </div>

        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Neil O'Brien MP</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>NeilDotObrien</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Just left DL committee. We passed a ban on plastic microbeads which pollute our oceans. Follows govt moves to: 

<img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f418.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Elephant" aria-label="Emoji: Elephant" /></div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I have just had an update from <a href="/SSE" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="67342845"><s>@</s><b>SSE</b></a> . The issue was a faulty insulator which has now been repaired.  If any further faults are identified, <a href="/SSE" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="67342845"><s>@</s><b>SSE</b></a> will take action to resolve them and we will be updated.  Ongoing, If residents have a powercut, they can call a Freephone number, 105.</p>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

I have requested an urgent update on the problem and what is being done to resolve it from <a href="/SSE" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="67342845"><s>@</s><b>SSE</b></a> and will keep everyone updated.</p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Theresa May Retweeted Donald Tusk</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Thank you to Presidents <a href="/JunckerEU" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="169426475"><s>@</s><b>JunckerEU</b></a> and <a href="/donaldtusk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="375146901"><s>@</s><b>donaldtusk</b></a>. Today is an important step on the road to delivering a smooth and orderly Brexit and forging our deep and special future partnership.<a href="https://t.co/PSaATiA17n" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/eucopresident/status/941630669939249152" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/eucopresident/status/941630669939249152"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/eucopresident/</span><span class="invisible">status/941630669939249152</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Theresa May added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/Conservatives" data-user-id="14281853">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">.<span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="747807250819981312"><s>@</s><b>theresa_may</b></span> has announced proposals which could give 2.5 million former Armed Forces personnel driving licences identifying them as veterans in recognition of their service to the nation. <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/xEHgUOxJYD</span></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Zac Goldsmith</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>ZacGoldsmith</b></span>
  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Climate change is a genuine threat to humanity. We need to apply pressure and incentivise each other to do more.

UK Climate Envoy Nick Bridge explains how Britain is leading climate action.

<a href="/hashtag/OnePlanet?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>OnePlanet</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/OnePlanetSummit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>OnePlanetSummit</b></a><a href="https://t.co/oZqOQDmxiI" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/oZqOQDmxiI</a></p>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="940529329833947136" id="stream-item-tweet-940529329833947136" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;940529329833947136&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">
    


  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="940529329833947136" data-item-id="940529329833947136" data-permalink-path="/claireperrymp/status/940529329833947136" data-conversation-id="940529329833947136" data-tweet-nonce="940529329833947136-51628383-761d-4b07-93b9-2d0d0945617d" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="claireperrymp" data-name="Claire Perry" data-user-id="939151060391940096" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;939151060391940096&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;claireperrymp&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Claire Perry&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Claire Perry&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Claire Perry&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Claire Perry Retweeted Theresa May</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Delighted for the Prime Minister to join me today in <a href="/hashtag/Paris?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Paris</b></a> for the <a href="/hashtag/OnePlanetSummit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>OnePlanetSummit</b></a> to tackle <a href="/hashtag/climatechange?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>climatechange</b></a><a href="https://t.co/SBzltUw0qK" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/theresa_may/status/940470472168431616" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/theresa_may/status/940470472168431616"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/theresa_may/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/940470472168431616</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Claire Perry added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/theresa_may/status/940470472168431616" data-conversation-id="940470472168431616" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="940470472168431616" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="theresa_may" data-user-id="747807250819981312" href="/theresa_may/status/940470472168431616" data-conversation-id="940470472168431616" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Theresa May</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>theresa_may</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Tackling climate change and mitigating its effects for the worlds poorest are among the most critical challenges the world faces. That is why I will join other world leaders gathering in <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Paris</b></span> today for the <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>OnePlanetSummit</b></span>: <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2017/dec/12/theresa-may-uk-green-economy" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2017/dec/12/theresa-may-uk-green-economy"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">theguardian.com/commentisfree/</span><span class="invisible">2017/dec/12/theresa-may-uk-green-economy</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span> <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>OnePlanet</b></span></div>
        </div>

    <h2 class="title">Loading seems to be taking a while.</h2>
    <p>
      Twitter may be over capacity or experiencing a momentary hiccup. <a role="button" href="#" class="try-again-after-whale">Try again</a> or visit <a target="_blank" href="http://status.twitter.com" rel="noopener">Twitter Status</a> for more information.
    </p>
  </div>
